options.content:
# Info

This dashboard is meant to be used as an starting point to monitor SDK metrics. 

# Prerequisites

- Temporal Workers configured to emmit metrics 
- Prometheus running and scraping worker metrics

# Setup

Once the panel is imported into Grafana we need to create a Prometheus datasource from where Grafana will read the metrics.

# Useful links: 
- https://github.com/temporalio/samples-java/tree/main/core/src/main/java/io/temporal/samples/metrics
